text: Anxious Records was a record label set up by David A. Stewart of Eurythmics. Besides distributing his own records, the label also distributed groups including Londonbeat and the Dutch band Soft Parade. ==Anxious Records== Anxious Records signed the following acts: * Chris Braide * Curve * Freaks of Desire * Terry Hall * Toni Halliday * JC-001 * Londonbeat * Jimmy Nellis * Miss World * Nan Vernon * Jonathan Perkins * Pleasure* * Soft Parade (NL) * The Starlings * Anka Wolbert * Nick Green * The Flame ==See also== * List of record labels Category:Defunct record labels of the United Kingdom Category:Vanity record labels
title: Anxious Records
